body: Let the word go forth from this time and place, to coomer and cringer alike, that the torch has been passed to a new generation of perverts-—born in these 6 digits, tempered by snuff, disciplined by a hard and bitter fap, proud of our wretched tastes—and unwilling to witness or permit the slow undoing of those cursed doujins to which this site has always been committed, and to which we are committed today at nhentai and around the web.
Wanted some yuri, got like 2 pages of it, now going through a rabbit hole of Girls Und Panzer lore
Tfw you forget to check the tags...
In case anyone's curious why this TK classic is reappearing in their feed, the gallery was updated with a translated post script.
